Gerund prefix / present participle ⇔ particles

𓅓 im Tanze —> dancing
𓅓 am Tanzen —> dancing

𓅓𓁹 ⲙⲟⲛⲕ , ⲡ.ⲥ. ⲙⲁⲛⲕ- to make, form; qual. to be made,formed, worked
𓅓𓁹 ⲙⲁⲛⲕ ⲡ.ⲥ.ⲭ ⲣⲉϥⲙⲉⲛⲕ- n. maker

ϫⲓⲛ- ⇔ syn, don 𓂡 𓂞 𓂦

𓅓 ≈ ⲙⲁⲛ- locative gerund "where" wo-man-… 𓉧

𓅓 𓂋 𓐍 𓏜 im'reckon "knowingly" <> εν γνώσει en gnósei <> medvetet, мэдсээр medseer 𓅓 𓂋 𓐍 𓏜 im'reckon "knowingly" <> εν γνώσει <> عن علم ‘an ‘ilm “with knowledge”
